function.description: Connect to a Mssql database. Returns a connection object. The host parameter wants the name of the host. The default port is 3306 but can be set to a different port is necessary. The database parameter wants the name of the database you want to connect to. The user and pass parameter are for the username and password. Both are optional. The options parameter is optional. It is used for setting mssql specific options. These can be found here: http://jtds.sourceforge.net/faq.html#urlFormat

example.header: Connect to the MsSQL database "testdb" with user "user" and password "pass".
